Class CourseDBStructure

  • java.lang.Object
    • CourseDBStructure
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CourseDBStructureInterface

    public class CourseDBStructure
extends java.lang.Object
implements CourseDBStructureInterface

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) java.util.LinkedList[] hashTable 
      (package private) int length 
      (package private) java.lang.String name 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CourseDBStructure(int length)
      This constructor accepts an integer argument, which is used to set the length of the linked list hashtable.
      CourseDBStructure(java.lang.String name, int length)
      This constructor accepts a String argument that is used to name the database and an integer argument that is used to initialize the hashtable field to be of a certain length.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void add(CourseDBElement element)
      This method accepts a course object and adds it to a given index of the hashtable according to the crn of the course object.
      CourseDBElement get(int crn)
      This method returns the course corresponding to a given crn.
      int getTableSize()
      This method returns the size of the hashtable.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CourseDBStructure

        public CourseDBStructure(int length)
        This constructor accepts an integer argument, which is used to set the length of the linked list hashtable.
        Parameters:
        length - The length of the hashtable.

      • CourseDBStructure

        public CourseDBStructure(java.lang.String name,
                         int length)
        This constructor accepts a String argument that is used to name the database and an integer argument that is used to initialize the hashtable field to be of a certain length.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the database.
        length - The length of the hashtable.

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public void add(CourseDBElement element)
        This method accepts a course object and adds it to a given index of the hashtable according to the crn of the course object. If the index is already occupied by another course object, the course is added to the end of the linked chain for that given index of the hashtable.
        Specified by:
        add in interface CourseDBStructureInterface
        Parameters:
        element - The course object to be added to the course database.

      • get

        public CourseDBElement get(int crn)
                    throws java.io.IOException
        This method returns the course corresponding to a given crn. If more than one course corresponds to this index, the crn of each course in the linked chain is compared with the crn supplied as an argument until it is found.
        Specified by:
        get in interface CourseDBStructureInterface
        Parameters:
        crn - The crn of the course.
        Returns:
        The course element corresponding to the given crn.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If the course element is not in the database.

      • getTableSize

        public int getTableSize()
        This method returns the size of the hashtable.
        Specified by:
        getTableSize in interface CourseDBStructureInterface
        Returns:
        The size of the hashtable.
